Only initialize spinner if it is not yet initialized

Previously, if one when adding a new transaction were to select
a budget option and capture a receipt the budget option was
reset. This is because the budget spinner was reset. To prevent
this, only reset the budget spinner if it currently is empty.

Merge pull request #24 from brarcher/transaction-add-fix

Only initialize spinner if it is not yet initialized

move capture receipt code to separate method

later this will be used from multiple locations

Request camera permission when attempting to capture receipt

On Android 6.0+ devices the Camera permission must be requested
at runtime. Without this, if the application does not have
the permission but attempts to use the Camera a crash occurs.

To avoid this, request the camera permission, and if provided,
capture a receipt.

Merge pull request #25 from brarcher/request-camera-permission

Request camera permission
